title: Rarely lose lane, but losing game due to derp teammates
body:
Hi there,

I am sure some of you have been in this situation. I am sick of being in this position.
3/0, 4/0 or something around that is my usual kda score when laning, but then ended the game with Defeated screen due to the other lane feeding harder than the enemy in my lane. Then he feeds, afk, dc. Or they are just unrankeds...
It doesnt matter if I help team by roaming or not. It doesnt matter if I am at bronze silver or gold, this happens.

For the purpose of learning to be better (get good), what should I do in this kind of situation?
Any positive encouraging idea to deal with this situation will be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
aaand it happened again just now. winning top lane 3/0 but mid feeding ahri 10/0.. and our mid is annie.
OP

All you can do is share knowledge.

I mean really you don't think their team has the same ideologie of a top laner losing 0-4?

Bot lane is often more important.

Try taking teleport though, it can make it easier to impact the game from top lane although it's not a definite.

Easier to port than roam and you can roam and then port top etc.

real mature reply by Bronze-4 Genisys here
*standing applause*

You suck up to them reaaaaaaaaaaaaally good when they do one thing right.
you like worship them.


makes them wanna do better. (not disappoint you)
(works on me)

After that try to nicely point out what they are doing wrong. Thats kind of how I carry games xD

top, mid, or bot

which means that
if I go top, I win top lane, but mid or bot feeds hard
if I go mid, I win mid lane, but top or bot feeds hard
if I go bot, I win bot lane, but top or mid feeds hard
in addition, sometimes our jungler helps feeding too.. but this is rare case

Note: You seem like solid midlaner with same experience. Duo sometime later? adding you

Surely that's not the case allllll the time? 

If playing mid, try and play snowbally roamey assassin champions so you can win lane AND help your lanes not feed. 

And I very rarely play these days, but if we're on at the same time one time, sure. How can you tell that though? haha

Yep, of course not all cases, but most of my loses are caused by this issue.

When I play mid, I do roam. But by the time I roam, enemy bot lane is 6/0 - 8/0.. or their top riven is 4/0
These silvers need to learn from koala on how to hug turret

about your stuff, oce.op.gg is op

Your MMR is savage. You're playing with all bronzes despite being silver 2. 

It's definitely something you're doing on your end, sorry. There's just no way you could have this bad of an MMR from your 'derp teammates'
